history-picker.clear-message: Are you sure that you want to clear your history? If you have recently opened a shared link, this might lose any custom tunes/breaks/songs that you had previously created.
history-picker.shared-link: You have opened a shared link. Your previous songs and tunes can be restored here.

import-dialog.title: Import
import-dialog.paste-placeholder: Paste link or raw data object…
import-dialog.break-used: Break is used in song, cannot be disabled.
import-dialog.break-exists-different: Already exists. Local version will be overridden.

pattern-list.create-pattern-empty-name-error: Please enter a name for the new break.
pattern-list.create-pattern-duplicate-name-error: This name is already taken. Please enter a different one.
pattern-list.remove-pattern-message: Do you really want to remove {{patternName}} ({{tuneName}})?
pattern-list.create-tune-empty-name-error: Please enter a name for the new tune.
pattern-list.create-tune-duplicate-name-error: This name is already taken. Please enter a different one.
pattern-list.rename-tune-empty-name-error: Please enter a new name for the tune.
pattern-list.rename-tune-duplicate-name-error: This name is already taken. Please enter a different one.
pattern-list.copy-tune-empty-name-error: Please enter a new name for the tune.
pattern-list.copy-tune-duplicate-name-error: This name is already taken. Please enter a different one.
pattern-list.remove-tune-message: Do you really want to remove the tune {{tuneName}}?

rename-pattern-dialog.empty-name-error: Please enter a new name for the break.
rename-pattern-dialog.duplicate-name-error: This name is already taken. Please type in a different name.

share-dialog.title: Share
share-dialog.link-description: Opening this URL will open the songs selected below and have the selected tunes/breaks available in the list.
share-dialog.raw-description: Copy this data into the “Import” menu to make the songs and tunes/breaks selected below available in the player.
share-dialog.customize-tooltip-used: Used in song, cannot be disabled

song-picker.remove-message: Do you really want to remove the song {{name}}?

song-player-toolbar.clear-song-message: Do you really want to clear the current song?

tune-info.notation-info: Click on the {{pen}} on the breaks below to see the notes.

pattern-player.restore-message: Are you sure that you want to revert your modifications and restore the original break?

pattern-placeholder.restore-message: Are you sure that you want to revert your modifications to {{patternName}} ({{tuneName}}) and restore the original break?

update.new-version: A new version of {{appName}} is available.
